profileAlternative.name: Suresh Dhandapani
profileAlternative.headline: LIMS Implementation and JAVA Programmer
profileAlternative.summary:
Experience with Laboratory Information Management System(LIMS).

Technologies experienced with - Java , Flex , JSP , Servlet ,Tomcat Server, Weblogic Server Spring and Hiberante
Report & Tools : Crystal Report , iReport (JasperReport) and Joomla (Website)
Database : MS SQL Server 2008 R2 and 2012 , Oracle 10g , PL/SQL and PostgreSQL 9.1
LIMS experience with products : QuaLIS , Sample Manager 10 and Labware 7.
Domain knowledge - Pharmaceutical , Batch Approval and Stability Protocol with LIMS products.
Key responsibilities as Technical Lead and Customer Support.

Various documents : Installation Qualification (IQ), Operational Qualification (OQ) and Performance Qualification (PQ) ,Test Plan, Test cases for the related applications
